textSub.string:
The oysters in this part of the reef don't stay open very long.
 If you're trying to steal their precious treasure you'll have to
 move fast!

textSub.name: para2
textSub.string:
HINT: Black Pearls
 The mysterious black pearl is 5 times more
 valuable than the ordinary white pearl. That
 will help you grow up pretty quickly!
